data.name: String To Spiral
data.description:
Given a string ```s```, you will convert it to a square spiral of the smallest possible size. If the length of the string isn't a perfect square, add whitespace to the end of your string. You will be starting the spiral from the top left corner.

Examples

``` "Str\n" + toSpiral("String Ex") -> "Exi\n" + " gn" ``` ``` "Hel\n" + toSpiral("Hello!") -> " l\n" + " !o" ``` String s = ```"Once a post or page has been shared on Facebook, the images have been stored in a cache on their server for future shares. Facebook doesn’t look at the page again for new images until their cache expires. This time period is unpredictable, but can be days or weeks."``` toSpiral(s) -> (`\n` omitted) ``` "Once a post or pa" "e been stored ing" "ves. Facebook d e" "arnew images uoa " "ha is time pene h" " hrh but canrtsca" "ssoT,s. iinas" "e f ek bol’c " "ge .le ed thb" "arnsbe t ee" "muieaw dihl e" "itart ro syaseoon" " ugiciderpnu ion " "efapxe ehcac rk s" "h egap eht ta th" "trof revres rieha" " ,koobecaF no der" ```
